nodes.goal: Isolate variable x on left side of the equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 2*x from both sides to get 2*x = -14.

nodes.goal: Simplify the left side of the equation
nodes.plan: Divide both sides by 2 to get x = -14/2.

nodes.goal: Verify the solution satisfies the original equation
nodes.plan: Substitute x = -7 into the original equation to check for equality.
